name: Blaziken
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Metagross
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Rayquaza
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Rayquaza during your opponent's next turn.

name: Sceptile
Attack1Text: After your attack, remove from Sceptile the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon. If Sceptile has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Swampert
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Beautifly
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Masquerain
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Murkrow
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

name: Pupitar
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Torkoal
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Larvitar
Attack1Text: If the Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Minun
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to each of those Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Plusle
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Plusle during your opponent's next turn.

name: Surskit
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Swellow
Attack1Text: During your next turn, base damage of Swellow's Agility is 70 instead of 30.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Swellow during your opponent's next turn.
